response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, we propose a price of $15,000 for this transaction. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 15000}
